constraints: Completeness (gist): The response offers a short but complete answer or summary that touches the main points once without exploring every detail.

Channel (sync): The response takes the shape of a synchronous or live session plan (agenda, steps, cues) rather than static reference text.
Directional (fig): The response applies an abstracting-generalizing-concretizing-grounding perspective as a single synthesized lens on the preceding prompt.
